sentences.sContent: Endless, of the impenitent and unbelieving.
sentences.sCn: 无止境的，对不知悔改的和不信。

sentences.sContent: We need to remember that God's wrath does burn against impenitent sinners (Psalm 38:1-3).
sentences.sContent_eng: We need to remember that God's wrath does burn against impenitent sinners (Psalm 38:1-3).
sentences.sCn: 我们必须铭记上帝的愤怒曾烧死了不知悔改的恶人（圣歌38：1-3）。

sentences.sContent: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God;
sentences.sContent_eng: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God;
sentences.sCn: 你竟任着你刚硬不悔改的心，为自己积蓄忿怒，以致神震怒，显出他公义审判的日子来到。

synos.tran: 顽固的人；不知悔改的人

remMethod.val: im (不) + penitent (悔恨的) → 不悔悟的

words.tran: 不能通过的；顽固的；费解的；不接纳的

trans.tranCn: 顽固的人；不知悔改的人
